title: Recruiting players for hitrost esports
body:
Hello :) I am looking for players who are interested in joining our organisation Hitrost esports. We have made a name for ourselves in cs go with our male and female teams and are interested in making a league of legends team :). If you're interested, add me at "Kiter".
Requirements:
-Active
-Plat and above 
-Main two or more roles
-Preferable if you live around Sydney

replies.body: IM bronze but Challenger At Heart

IGN - I Am Pretty Bad
Age -  25
Location -  Perth
Current rating -  S1 - x , S2 - Gold , S3 - Plat, S4 - Plat, S5 - Inactive in Ranked, S6 - Plat
Role & Champion pool - Supp Main > Zyra,Karma,Raka,Braum,Alistar,Thresh, Janna, Morgana, Brand
Jungle/ADC off - Lee, Zac, Graves, Heca, Vayne, Jhin
I don't like solo queue, have never liked solo queue, The coordination of a whole unit together fascinates and excites me far more than individual skill, So I would rather be putting my time and effort into achieving a teamwide goal than individual, in saying that as soon as I'm ready to take the game more seriously I will, but as of lately I'm bored until i find a team so dont let me layback playstyle fool you if it's just normal stats
Can play anywhere if team is willing to put in the time to work at it then I will take it seriously
Any competitive experiences prior - Various ranked 5's teams that fall through to un committed people to working together and helping eachother correcting mistakes, A few university LoL tournys in WA 
Can travel if things get serious 
{{champion:143}}

WELL
I only got g2 after being b5 last season
Going for diamond next season
Plat V in under 100 games this season. Can play any lane/jg at a plat level. Live in western Sydney. Add me IG.
I'm interested, D5 - jung main but can flex to mid/top with some practice.

I can play anytime
Main was diamond 1 played for SIN gaming.
I main jungle can play anything. 
I live in Wollongong. Can catch train/drive etc.
Depends what rank everyone is aye
So far we have two diamonds and 1 plat
